name: El Fuego
description:
El Fuego is a shooter game about survival. Your fate is tied to the fire. Maintain the fire, and you will survive longer from the undead. 

 You have limited wood and limited visibility. Wood adds fuel to the fire or creates arrows for you to shoot the undead.

You must mine wood from trees, and then choose: Do you create more arrows or add more fuel to the fire? If you stay near the fire, you are protected from the undead. The game ends when you die. The fire will inevitably burn out.

LEFT MOUSE - Shoot arrow (hold to charge)
RIGHT MOUSE - Sword attack
W S A D - Movement keys
SHIFT - Sprint
SPACEBAR - Mine trees (creates wood) or add wood to fire (2 wood req'd)
CONTROL - Craft 10 arrows from wood (1 wood req'd)
P - Pause Game
R - Restart Game
